message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today.  I think it would really suit your needs. I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $200 is a bit too high for my budget.  Would you consider $100?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 is my starting price, I could meet you halfway and do $150 for it.  This would be a great deal for you!
